section.heading: Transition.
section.text: For a period of 2 years following March 6, 2007, all references in this chapter to surgical assistants shall be deemed to refer to persons meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether they are licensed in fact.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 6, 2007, D.C. Law 16-228, ยง 2(i), 53 DCR 10244

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Licensing of health professionals, general qualifications of applicants, see ยง 3-1205.03.
